message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take a dollar and we can call it a day.
I'll give you a decent chunk, but don't expect me to be generous
Let's split it down the middle this time, Bob.  It's getting risky to keep going.
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a bit more, but not much
Bob, I'm starting to feel the pressure of inflation.  Let's compromise and meet in the middle this time.
